hadiths.text: Rauh and Yahya b. Kathir narrated as Nasr reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) entered into the state of Ihram for Hajj. And in the narration of Abu Shihab (the words are):We went out with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) pronouncing Talbiya for Hajj, And in an the ahadith (narrated in this connection the words are): He led the morning prayer at al-Batha', except al- jahdami who did not make mention of it

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ الْعُمْرَةِ فِي أَشْهُرِ الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to perform 'Umrah during the months of Hajj
